content.rendered:
Apply now for your Celebrations. All you need is your SA ID number and 3 latest payslips or bank statements. Shape a better tomorrow with a Mariner loans from R10,000 up to R500,000.

Wedding loans are collateral-free loans. This means that the loan approval depends on credit score, age, repayment capacity, income, etc. Before applying, make sure that you:

-Check your credit score and fix the errors, if any.
-Compare the interest rates online that various banks and lenders offer.
-Use an EMI calculator to check how much you would be paying and whether you can pay the EMIs comfortably.

Service benefits

  • You can use the loan amount to fund several expenses
  • The loan is sanctioned easily
  • You can apply for the loan online
  • You can pay off the loan in easy EMIs over a stipulated tenure
  • You needn’t liquidate any assets
